TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NamedPipeServerStream extends System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream
Public NotInheritable Class NamedPipeServerStream Inherits PipeStream
public ref class NamedPipeServerStream sealed : System::IO::Pipes::PipeStream

summary.span: Exposes a around a named pipe, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

span.span: Exposes a around a named pipe, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名的管道提供单向或双工管道的管道服务器与一个或多个管道客户端之间的通信。Named pipes provide one-way or duplex pipes for communication between a pipe server and one or more pipe clients. 本地或网络，可以进行进程间通信使用命名的管道。Named pipes can be used for interprocess communication locally or over a network. 可由多个共享单个管道名称对象。A single pipe name can be shared by multiple objects. 任何进程可以充当命名的管道服务器和/或客户端。Any process can act as either a named pipe server or client, or both. > [!NOTE] > 有关[!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)]，最多 10 个管道可以通过网络同时连接。For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], a maximum of 10 pipes can simultaneously connect over the network. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一种方法将字符串从父进程发送到同一计算机上使用命名管道的子进程。The following example demonstrates a way to send a string from a parent process to a child process on the same computer using named pipes. 此示例将创建对象中父进程的值。This example creates a object in a parent process with a value of . 然后等待服务器中用于连接到它的子进程的对象。The server then waits for a object in a child process to connect to it. 在此示例中，这两个进程都位于同一台计算机上并对象具有的值。In this example, both processes are on the same computer and the object has a value of . 接下来，父进程将用户提供的字符串发送给子进程。The parent process then sends a user-supplied string to the child process. 该字符串显示到控制台。The string is displayed to the console. 此示例适用于服务器过程中，使用类。This example is for the server process, which uses the class. 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码管道客户端和服务器，请参阅[如何： 使用命名管道进行网络进程间通信](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication.md)。For the entire code example, including the code for both the pipe client and server, see [How to: Use Named Pipes for Network Interprocess Communication](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication.md). [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法会阻塞，直到所有已发送的字符都已读取，除非将管道的传输模式设置为中创建的构造函数设置缓冲区大小和对象。Calling the method will block until all the sent characters have been read unless the transmission mode of the pipe is set to and the buffer size is set in the constructor that created the object. 在这种情况下，将接收不是所有的消息。In this case, not all of the messages will be received. 调用会导致服务器进行阻止，直到从管道读取所有数据。Calling causes the server to block until all the data has been read from the pipe.

summary.span: Gets the user name of the client on the other end of the pipe.

span.span: Gets the user name of the client on the other end of the pipe.

returns.span: The user name of the client on the other end of the pipe.

span.span: The user name of the client on the other end of the pipe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将返回`null`如果客户端但尚未写入管道，或连接的客户端未与连接的。The method returns `null` if the client has not yet written to the pipe or if the connected client did not connect with a of . ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个方法来创建多个同时进行的客户端请求，可响应的管道服务器和客户端模拟的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to create a pipe server that can respond to multiple simultaneous client requests, and a method for client impersonation. 此示例将创建对象中父进程，然后创建多个线程等待要连接的对象。This example creates a object in a parent process, which then creates multiple threads that wait for objects to connect. 客户端连接后，它会提供到服务器的文件名称，该文件的内容是读取和发送回客户端。After a client is connected, it supplies a file name to the server and the contents of that file are read and sent back to the client. 因为模拟客户端打开文件时，客户端可以请求只有文件其具有足够的权限打开。Because the impersonates the client when opening the file, the client can request only files that it has sufficient permissions to open. [!code-cpp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/cpp/program.cpp#01)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接客户端的权限应用于远程服务器。The connecting client's permissions are applied to the remote server. 例如，如果连接的客户端尝试请求服务器上的文件的内容时，客户端可以请求具有足够的权限打开的文件。For example, if the connecting client tries to request the contents of a file on the server, the client can request only files that it has sufficient permissions to open. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个方法来创建多个同时进行的客户端请求，可响应的管道服务器和客户端模拟的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to create a pipe server that can respond to multiple simultaneous client requests, and a method for client impersonation. 此示例将创建对象中父进程，然后创建多个线程等待要连接的对象。This example creates a object in a parent process, which then creates multiple threads that wait for objects to connect. 客户端连接后，它会提供到服务器的文件名称，该文件的内容是读取和发送回客户端。After a client is connected, it supplies a file name to the server and the contents of that file are read and sent back to the client. 因为模拟客户端打开文件时，客户端可以请求只有文件其具有足够的权限打开。Because the impersonates the client when opening the file, the client can request only files that it has sufficient permissions to open. [!code-cpp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/cpp/program.cpp#01)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法会导致对象进行阻止，直到客户端连接。Calling this method causes the object to block until a client connects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将字符串从父进程发送到子进程，使用命名管道的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to send a string from a parent process to a child process using named pipes. 此示例将创建父进程中的对象。This example creates a object in a parent process. 此对象是否有的值，然后进行阻止，直到对象建立与对象。This object has a value of , which then blocks until a object establishes a connection to the object. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供和类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the and classes. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为它是异步的此方法将立即返回，但在连接过程完成时，客户端调用或。Because it is asynchronous, this method returns immediately, but the connection process is completed when the client calls or .

summary.span: Asynchronously waits for a client to connect to this object and monitors cancellation requests.

span.span: Asynchronously waits for a client to connect to this object and monitors cancellation requests.

returns.span: A task that represents the asynchronous wait operation.

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous wait operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为它是异步的此方法将立即返回，但在连接过程完成时，客户端调用或。Because it is asynchronous, this method returns immediately, but the connection process is completed when the client calls or . 取消请求使用取消标记才起作用对象创建管道选项值为或者如果取消发生之前调用方法。Cancellation requests using the cancellation token will only work if the object was created with a pipe option value of or if the cancellation occurs before the method is called.
